rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: At the beginning of the month, Camara found 246 dead birds. This week, his [Camara's] team found 107, mainly royal terns.
At the beginning of the month, Camara found 246 dead birds. This week, his [Camara's] team found 107, mainly royal terns.
